Subject: Content Aware Protection Policies can't be modified/deleted
Description: Hallo Support, In the console, several policies are displayed with the status “in processing” and cannot be edited or deleted. Environment: PROD URL: https://ygh5qe0.unify.endpointprotector.com/ Please check and fix it. Regards Anatoli Lorenz
What_We_Know__c:
11 February 2025 - Customer confirmed that the issue is still present in 7.2.0
16 Dec - The customer needs to apply 720 on production
10 Dec - This item was covered in 7.2.0. Customer feedback is needed.
09 Sept - Will be part of 7.2.0 release
02 Sept -  QA confirmed that is all good, problem is solved in 7.2.0
22 July - Bug reported already by our QA team and it's fixed, will be released in 7.2.0
Next_Steps__c:
- Check with QA team if the issue is reproducible
- check with customer if the issue is resolved in 7.2.0
Solution_Comment__c: Ticket closed by the client after testing the scenario again.
